title: Catoctin Mountain Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Catoctin Mountain Park Hands-on Trail Workshop      Time: 9:30 AM to 1:00 PM Location: Meet at park visitor center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Learn how to improve the grade and tread of a trail with this hands-on workshop while helping to preserve and restore a section of park trail.  No experience necessary.
